data.name: Spattle Cats Sound Track
data.detailed_description:
Spattle Cats Sound Track


A collection of high quality, new full length music tracks not included with the original game. All tracks come in mp3 format.

TRACK LIST:
Spattle Cats Track 1 - Length 1:36
Spattle Cats Track 2 - Length 1:40
Spattle Cats Track 3 - Length 1:45
Spattle Cats Track 4 - Length 1:11
Spattle Cats Track 5 - Length 3:28

FEATURES:
5 New High Quality Full Length Tracks
MP3 Format

After installing this DLC, a folder titled DLC Sound Track will appear in your Spattle Cats app folder. This will contain the 5 High Quality Music Tracks.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7 32-bit or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 500 Megs VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
